software.name: Insignia Setup Assistant
software.author: Insignia Team
software.description: The Insignia Setup Assistant is a small application that will allow you to register your console with Insignia. The method of launching the Setup Assistant will depend on the current state of your console.

software.name: XBLUnlock
software.author: Insignia Team
software.description: Small, PoC-type tool to patch Xbox BIOSes in RAM in order to disable patching code that makes the BIOS block XBL.

software.name: Cromwell
software.author: XboxDev
software.description: Cromwell is a free, legal BIOS replacement for the original Xbox. It is capable of loading Linux from the Xbox's Hard Disk, and CD-ROM. It is not able to load original Xbox games, neither originals nor copies.
